reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 644: APPLICATION OF SECTION 2 OF ACT

content.content: 1. In addition to the persons mentioned in section 3 of the Act, section 2 of the Act does not apply to a person, (a) who practised hypnosis for a period of five years before the 1st day of January, 1961; (b) who earned an average of $2,500 a year from the performance of hypnosis during the five-year period; and (c) who does not perform hypnosis, (i) for the purpose of providing public entertainment, or (ii) in the practice of medicine or of dentistry. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 644, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In addition to the persons mentioned in section 3 of the Act, section 2 of the Act does not apply to a person,

(a) who practised hypnosis for a period of five years before the 1st day of January, 1961;

(b) who earned an average of $2,500 a year from the performance of hypnosis during the five-year period; and

(c) who does not perform hypnosis,

(i) for the purpose of providing public entertainment, or

(ii) in the practice of medicine or of dentistry. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 644, s. 1.
